subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Until last Sunday, Antonio Cromartie toiled in obscurity for the San Diego Chargers. On that day, a month after he was beaten on the throw that went for Brett Favre’s record-tying 420th touchdown pass, Cromartie had a breakout game.
snippet: Until last Sunday, Antonio Cromartie toiled in obscurity for the San Diego Chargers. On that day, a month after he was beaten on the throw that went for Brett Favre’s record-tying 420th touchdown pass, Cromartie had a breakout game.
